UseShortArrayInitializer.description:
Description

When declaring and initializing array fields or variables, it is not necessary to explicitly create a new array
usingnew. Instead one can simply define the initial content of the array as a expression in curly braces.

E.g.int[] x = new int[] { 1, 2, 3 };can be written asint[] x = { 1, 2, 3 };.
